lead_paragraph: “Armed in America” examines gun violence through films and town-hall discussions. Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani sing about their love on “The Voice.” And now’s the time to catch up on “UnReal.”
snippet: “Armed in America” examines gun violence through films and town-hall discussions. Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani sing about their love on “The Voice.” And now’s the time to catch up on “UnReal.”
